system.description: When you try to overtake another vehicle, roll+cool, modified by the vehiclesâ€™ relative speed.

failure.label: Complications
failure.value:
On a miss, your counterpart chooses 1 against you.

  • You overtake them, but your vehicle suffers 1·Harm ap the same.
  • You don’t overtake them, but you can drive them into a place you choose.
  • They outdistance you, but their vehicle suffers 1·Harm ap the same.

partial.label: Partial Success
partial.value:
On a 7–9, choose 1:

  • You overtake them, but your vehicle suffers 1·Harm ap the same.
  • You don’t overtake them, but you can drive them into a place you choose.
  • They outdistance you, but their vehicle suffers 1·Harm ap the same.

success.label: Success
success.value: On a 10+, you overtake them and draw alongside.
